book.title: A Stab in the Dark (Matthew Scudder #4)
book.description: Storyline: A Stab in the Dark (Matthew Scudder #4) \n Louis Pinell, the recently apprehended "Icepick Prowler," freely admits to having slain seven young women nine years ago -- but be swears it was a copycat who killed Barbara Ettinger Matthew Scudder believes him. But the trail to Ettinger's true murderer is twisted, dark and dangerous...and even colder than the almost decade-old corpse the p.i. is determined to avenge.\n
book.author: Lawrence Block
